GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Fix possible memory leak when failing to issue CMF WQE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 4eb7a1beff03836d3df271cd23b790884e3facb9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: lpfc: Fix possible memory leak when failing to issue CMF WQE
